ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Herbert W. Virgin, Washington University (St. Louis, Missouri, United States) for providing the MNV strain used as sample process control. For urban wastewater sample collection, we gratefully acknowledge the assistance of the following members of the Italian Wastewater Network: Meris Poli (Eco Center AG, Bolzano); Margherita De Ceglia, Marco Simonetti (SMAT, Castiglione T.se); Francesca Pizza, Marco Blazina (MM SpA, Milano); Patrizia Albertelli (ARPAE, Bologna); Alesandro Orsini, Giuseppe Miccich√©, Tania Giachini, Federico Barducci (ACEA SpA, Roma); Giuseppe Gala (ACA SpA, Pescara); Paolo Di Marzio, Piero Coletti (Consorzio Bonifica Centro, Chieti); Jlenia Cupaiolo (ARAP Abruzzo, Avezzano, Sulmona, Vasto, San Salvo), Maria Teresa Gallo (ARPAC, Napoli); Giuseppe Siragusa, Antonella Cicala (AMAP, Palermo).
